entry.summary: Hyper Light Drifter is a game released in 2016 by Heart Machine. It follows a character called “The Drifter”, who explores a ruined land seeking a cure for its disease. I first heard about Hyper Light Drifter when it released, but didn’t give it much thought. I was (at the time) obsessed with Starbound, and would spend the next years on Hollow Knight and Splatoon 2.
